hangle: 온실에서 있을 티 파티에 영애를 초대하고 싶습니다.』
first_translate: I would like to invite you to a tea party in the greenhouse this afternoon.”
second_translate: I would like to invite you to a tea party in the greenhouse this afternoon.
Isn't this the lady from yesterday, the one who had an issue with Siegren?

hangle: 어제 시그렌이랑 일이 있었던 그 영애 아냐?
first_translate: ...the lady who caused trouble with siegren yesterday?
second_translate: ...the lady who had an incident with Siegren yesterday?

hangle: 그런 사람이 여는 티파티에 내가 가도 되는 건가?
first_translate: should I really go to her tea party?
second_translate: Should I really attend a tea party hosted by someone like her?

hangle: 내가 괜히 신경 쓸 만한 이유는 없지.
first_translate: well, I don’t see why not.
second_translate: There’s no reason for me to be concerned.

first_translate: she’s the one who did something wrong.

hangle: 어쩌면 티파티에서 유니스를 만날 수 있을지도 모르니까.
first_translate: and I might be able to see eunice there.
second_translate: Maybe I'll get to see Eunice at the tea party.
Tell her that I’ll gladly accept the invitation.

first_translate: were you invited to the tea party as well?
second_translate: Were you invited to the tea party as well, Lady Eunice?

hangle: 피오나 영애와는 같은 일행임에도 계속 얼굴을 볼 수가 없었네요.
first_translate: I haven’t been able to see you even though we’re traveling together.
second_translate: I haven't had the chance to see you much, even though we're traveling together.

first_translate: you should come ride in the carriage with me.
second_translate: …Still, please come to the carriage too.
I get bored when I'm alone...

hangle: 주변에 온통 기사랑 병사라서 쓸쓸했나 봐.
first_translate: she must have felt lonely with only knights and soldiers around her.
second_translate: She must have felt lonely being surrounded only by knights and soldiers.
My lady is waiting for you inside.
Thank you for accepting my invitation.

first_translate: wow, she really is a beauty.
she’s the one who tried to seduce siegren.
second_translate: So, this is the kind of woman who tried to seduce Siegren.

first_translate: these are ladies from nearby territories.
second_translate: These are young ladies from nearby territories.

hangle: 명성이 자자한 두 분을 만나서 영광이에요.
first_translate: it’s an honor to meet you both.
second_translate: It’s an honor to meet two people of such great renown.
I hope we get along well.

hangle: 묘하게 시선이 불온한 것 같은 느낌이….
first_translate: why do I feel like they’re giving me weird looks?
second_translate: Why do I feel like their gazes are somewhat unsettling?

first_translate: I heard you were in the north, lady fiona.
second_translate: I heard that Lady Heilon was in the north.

hangle: 거기에는 굉장히 야만적이고 잔혹한 마법사가 산다고 들었는데….
first_translate: I heard a very barbaric and cruel sorcerer lives there...
second_translate: I've heard that a very barbaric and cruel sorcerer lives there…

first_translate: it’s just like any other place where people live.
what? that rumor spread all the way here?
second_translate: What? That rumor made it all the way here?
I heard your bloodline is somewhat special.

first_translate: I heard you’re not originally from house hylon.
second_translate: I heard you weren’t originally from House Hailon.
You're an illegitimate child, aren't you?

hangle: 네. 마약 사업 혐의로 재산을 몰수당했죠.
first_translate: yes, their wealth was confiscated for drug trafficking.
second_translate: Yes. Their wealth was confiscated on charges of drug trafficking.

first_translate: I was the one who reported them.
second_translate: I was the one who reported it myself.

first_translate: my goodness, I could never do that.
second_translate: My goodness, I could never bring myself to do that.

hangle: 무슨 이유에서든 가족을 자기 손으로 배신하는 건…
first_translate: betraying your own family with your own hands, no matter the reason...
second_translate: Betraying your own family with your own hands... no matter the reason...

first_translate: only a beast would do that.
second_translate: Only a beast would do such a thing.

first_translate: what are you trying to say?
second_translate: What is it that you want to say?

first_translate: I’m saying you should know your place!
even if you were lucky enough to be adopted,
second_translate: Even if you were fortunate enough to be adopted,

first_translate: you should know your place as a noble lady.
second_translate: As a noble lady, you should observe proper decorum.

hangle: 피오나 영애 왜 딴 곳을 보시죠.
first_translate: lady fiona, why are you looking elsewhere?
second_translate: Lady Fiona, why are you looking away?

hangle: 지금 제가 말하고 있는 게 안 보이나요?
first_translate: can’t you see I’m talking to you?
second_translate: Can't you see that I'm talking right now?
I still have more to say.

hangle: 남의 저택에서 신세를 지고 있는 와중에 전하께 꼬리를 치셨죠?
first_translate: you tried to seduce his highness while staying at someone else’s manor, didn’t you?
second_translate: You tried to seduce His Highness while being a guest at someone else's manor, didn't you?

first_translate: my maid told me about last night--
second_translate: My maid told me about it last night.

first_translate: you’re going too far, lady heather!
second_translate: Lady Aden, your words are too harsh!
Harsh? What’s so harsh about it?

hangle: 전 사생아고, 제가 태어난 가문도 직접 부수었죠.
first_translate: I’m an illegitimate child, and I destroyed the family I was born into.
second_translate: I'm an illegitimate child, and I personally destroyed the family I was born into.

hangle: 하지만 똑똑한 아덴 영애가 하나 파악하지 못한 게 있네요.
first_translate: but there’s one thing that a smart lady like you failed to realize.
second_translate: But there's one thing that the smart Lady Aden failed to realize.

first_translate: thanks to that, I now have both...
second_translate: Thanks to that, I now have both power and influence.
I've got both power and authority.

hangle: 지금 이 자리에서 제가 영애의 머리카락을 불태워도
first_translate: that means even if I burn your hair right now,
second_translate: Even if I burn your hair right here and now,

hangle: 아덴 자작님은 제 아버지께 항의서 몇 장 보내는 게 고작일 거란 뜻이죠.
first_translate: the most your father could do is send a few letters of protest to my father.
second_translate: At most, Viscount Aden could send a few letters of protest to my father.

hangle: 망아지처럼 구는 것도 상대를 보면서 하세요.
first_translate: don’t act recklessly without considering who you’re dealing with.
second_translate: Don't act recklessly without knowing who you're dealing with.

first_translate: it looks like you’re having a lot of fun at your tea party,
second_translate: It looks like you're enjoying your tea party quite a bit.

hangle: 어제 그런 일이 있었으니 고개를 못 들겠지.
first_translate: she can’t even look at him after what happened yesterday.
second_translate: She can't even lift her head after what happened yesterday.

first_translate: let me give you one last piece of advice.
second_translate: Let me give you one last piece of advice.
